content.rendered:
Creator BBC Natural History Unit

Directed by Alex Lanchester. Jane Atkins. Orla Doherty. James Reed. Rachel Scott

Cast David Attenborough( Self – Narrator6 episodes, 2022 ). Jamie McPherson( Self – Cameraman3 episodes, 2022 ). Helen Hobin( Self – Camerawoman2 episodes, 2022 ). Bertie Gregory( Self – Cameraman1 episode, 2022 ). Alun Hubbard( Self – Arctic University of Norway1 episode, 2022 ). Hugh Miller( Self – Underwater Cameraman1 episode, 2022 ). Leigh Hickmott( Self – Whale Biologist1 episode, 2022 ). Mark Brownlow( Self – Executive Producer1 episode, 2022 ). Aleqatsiaq Peary( Self – Inuit Hunter1 episode, 2022 ). Joe Treddenick( Self – Assistant Producer1 episode, 2022 ). James Grecian( Self – University of St Andrews1 episode, 2022 ). Justin Maguire( Self – Cameraman1 episode, 2022 ). Hamish Pritchard( Self – British Antarctic Survey1 episode, 2022 ). Sacha Thorpe( Self – Director1 episode, 2022 ). Bill Fraser( Self – Polar Oceans Research Group1 episode, 2022 ). Rachel Scott( Self – Director1 episode, 2022 ). Jessica Meir( Self – NASA Astronaut1 episode, 2022 ). Sridhar Anandakrishnan( Self – Penn State1 episode, 2022 ). Matt Erhardt( Self – Spotter Plane Pilot1 episode, 2022 ). Bjorne Kvernmo( Self – Boat Captain1 episode, 2022 ). Eric V. Regehr( Self – Polar Science Centre1 episode, 2022 ). Gary Stenson( Self – Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada1 episode, 2022 ). Dion Poncet( Self – Captain, MY Golden Fleece1 episode, 2022 ). Gennadiy Fedorov( Self – Wrangel Island Ranger1 episode, 2022 ). Will Lawson( Self – Assistant Producer1 episode, 2022 ). Dawson Dunning( Self – Cameraman1 episode, 2022 ). Sam Lewis( Self – Cameraman1 episode, 2022 ). Diego Araya( Self – Guide1 episode, 2022 ). Raymond Besant( Self – Cameraman1 episode, 2022 ). Katy Walter Anthony( Self – University of Alaska, Fairbanks1 episode, 2022 ). Erin McFadden( Self – Researcher1 episode, 2022 )

Language English

Producers Mark Brownlow. Elizabeth White. Alex Lanchester. Rachel Scott. Orla Doherty. Jane Atkins. James Reed

Production BBC Studios.

Season 2

Total Episodes 6
